name: King Beef Oven Brisket
author: Grady Spears
summary: Grady calls supper at Perini Ranch Steakhouse in Texas one of life's great pleasures. Here he's adapted their brisket recipe so you can make it at home in the oven.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix chili powder, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, sugar, mustard, and bay leaf together in a small bowl; season brisket with spice mixture
Arrange beef in a roasting pan or Dutch oven
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour
Fill pan with enough beef stock to cover by 1/2 inch
Cover pan with lid or aluminum foil and reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Continue baking until beef is very tender, about 3 hours more
Slice beef thinly, across the grain and serve with juices from the pan
